name: THAYERS Alcohol-Free, Hydrating Coconut Water Witch Hazel Facial Toner with Aloe Vera Formula, Vegan, Dermatologist Tested and Recommended, 12 Oz (Packaging May Vary)
short_description: NEW LOOK, SAME TONER FORMULA: Alcohol-free and formulated to purify, hydrate, and balance skin; This gentle face toner for men and women reduces the look of pores and smooth skin texture while maintaining the skin's moisture barrier​
SOOTHES SKIN AFTER SHAVE: Acts as an aftershave for men to hydrate, soothe irritation, and prevent razor burn. Apply this face care for men daily as part of a mens skincare routine.​
PROVEN RESULTS: In just one use of this face toner, skin feels nourished, healthier, skin tone appears even, and skin is hydrated all day long.​
PLANT + DERM ACTIVES: Made with certified organic Witch Hazel grown and harvested exclusively for Thayers on a family farm in Connecticut, Aloe Vera, and Glycerin​

NATURAL REMEDIES SINCE 1847: Thayers Witch Hazel extract is farm-to-bottle. It's picked by hand and made the old-fashioned way (via maceration) using water only and NEVER touching alcohol; Dermatologist tested for safety and 100 Percent cruelty free​
NUMBER 1 TONER BRAND: 8 Thayers toners are sold every minute. Thayers is the number 1 Toner Brand in America (Based on unit sales as reported by Nielsen for the 52 week period ending 1/11/25.)
product_description: Elevate your skincare routine with Thayers Alcohol-Free Witch Hazel Toner, your one step prep for better-looking bare skin. Our clinically tested formula purifies, reduces the appearance of pores, smooths texture, and refreshes skin with lasting hydration. Leveraging the potent power of medicinal plants and derm actives, our alcohol-free witch hazel and aloe vera soothes and balances while glycerin immediately hydrates. With nourishing natural ingredients, our toners can be used in countless ways. Tired of razor burn? This toner is the perfect mens aftershave to hydrate & soothe. Doing a full face of glam? Our toner purifies and preps skin. Do your nails need a refresh? Thayers cleanses nails before a mani. Dealing with sunburns, bug bites or fresh ink? This formula calms discomfort naturally. Thayers is backed by science to level up your skincare.

name: Witch Hazel Alcohol Free Toner by Leven Rose, 100% Pure Organic Facial Rose Water with Rose Petals, Calendula, Cucumber, and Chamomile Flower 4 oz
short_description: 100% Pure Organic Witch Hazel Toner - Perfect for toning face, neck, decolletage, eye area, dry skin, body and hair for balancing PH, hand spots, dark marks, combination oily skin, and to overall balance skin as a botanical astringent and toner.

Pure Ingriedents Only - Witch Hazel Alcohol Free and non oily, glycerin free, and additional fragrance free (no perfume added), paraben free, vegan friendly, as a distilled flowers for cool, instant, fresh, personal moisturizing pore prep. Great for sensitive skin for both women and mens skincare regimens. It’s Leven Rose’s philosophy that skin blossoms with the right skin food with essential vitamins coming from vegetable or flower sources when possible.

How to Use Witch Hazel Organic - Cleanse your skin using your normal routine. Mist or put a few drops on a cotton ball and smooth over skin area. Spray or apply over hair after using shampoo or conditioner. Apply lotion, moisturizer and makeup after toning skin.

Nothing Added or Taken Away - Stored in a dark amber bottle, that helps extend shelf life. Organics not packaged in dark bottles for storage may lose potency & become less effective from UV damage. Store in a dry cool place out of direct sunlight.
product_description: Introducing the Leven Rose Witch Hazel Toner, your new essential for a flawless daily beauty routine. Infused with the delicate aroma of rose petals, this refreshing toner instantly revitalizes your skin while a powerful blend of witch hazel, calendula, chamomile, and cucumber soothes and calms your complexion. Our 100% pure and natural formula serves as a potent pH balancer, leaving your skin feeling refreshed and nourished. Simply apply a few drops to a cotton ball and smooth it over your cleansed skin, or use it on your hair for an extra touch of nourishment. For an instant pick-me-up, use the mist sprayer to refresh your skin throughout the day. Embrace the transformative power of nature with Leven Rose Witch Hazel Toner, and elevate your skincare routine to new heights.

name: Rose Water Facial Toner - 32oz Bulk Alcohol-Free Vegan All Natural Refreshing for Face and Hair - Uplifts, Calming & Soothing for All Skin Types
short_description: Soothing for Skin: Rose water provides a calming effect on the skin, effectively soothing irritation and reducing redness. It's particularly beneficial for sensitive or irritated skin, helping to alleviate discomfort and diminish the appearance of puffiness, making it a gentle choice for anyone with sensitive skin.

Hydrating: It is naturally hydrating, providing the skin with a moisture boost without leaving an oily residue. This makes it suitable for all skin types, including oily and combination skin, as it helps to balance the skin's natural oils.

Antioxidant Properties: Packed with antioxidants, rose water helps to protect the skin from damage caused by free radicals and environmental stressors. This can help to slow down the aging process, keeping the skin looking youthful and radiant.

Natural Toner: Acting as a natural toner, it helps to tighten pores, improve skin texture, and maintain the skin’s pH balance. Regular use of rose water as a toner can lead to clearer, more vibrant skin.

Aromatherapy Benefits: The natural fragrance of roses is not only pleasant but also has aromatherapy benefits. Using rose water as a facial toner can provide a calming and uplifting effect, reducing stress and promoting emotional well-being.

product_description: Neutrogena Acne Stress Control Toner, Oil-Free Triple Action Toner is a multitasking pore cleaner. This toner for acne-prone skin is here to transform your skincare routine with a blend of nourishing ingredients & effective acne-fighting properties. The facial toner works three ways for clearer skin. Salicylic acid toner with MicroClear technology, treats acne even before it emerges, boosting delivery of clinically proven salicylic acid acne medicine, that acts as a face exfoliator, to unclog congested pores & allow treatment to penetrate deep within skin’s surface to the breakout source. Oil-dissolving complex helps reduce oil & shine. Apply a soaked toner pad to face daily after cleansing. Whether dealing with acne-prone skin or just need a reliable toner for oily skin, this Neutrogena toner is your go-to face skin care solution. Make acne one less stress in your life.

name: Good Molecules Niacinamide Brightening Toner - Toner for Face with Niacinamide and Arbutin for Skin Tone Balancing- Pore Minimizer, Skin Care for Face
short_description: BRIGHTEN, BALANCE, AND SOOTHE: Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Niacinamide Brightening Toner made with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant skin! Tone and brighten with this super gentle, alcohol-free toner!

TARGET HYPERPIGMENTATION, DULLNESS, AND ENLARGED PORES: Notice the difference in your skin! This gentle toner targets texture, dullness, uneven skin tone, and discoloration with a formula designed to bring out the best in your skin, leaving you glowing and refreshed.

POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Niacinamide and Arbutin work to brighten dull skin and improve the look of hyperpigmentation, while licorice root extract helps to soothe inflammation, giving your skin an even clear tone.
PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Dispense onto a cotton pad and gently sweep over freshly cleansed skin. Can also be dispensed into palms and patted into the skin until fully absorbed.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for daily use; this toner is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 6.2, is alcohol-free, vegan, and was never tested on animals.
FOR BEST RESULTS: Since everyone's skin is unique, we recommend performing a patch test before using this product to ensure compatibility and avoid any potential reactions.
